Vocabularies: This tab contains the suggested Vocabularies for data submission to Pofatu: Sample information, Artefact category and description, Site description, Parameter, Technique.
Contact us with questions or additions: hermann@shh.mpg.de

equals: (ratio of boron isotopes b11/b10 in the sample divided by ratio of b11/b10 in reference material srm951)  minus 1, multiplied by 1000
equals: (ratio of carbon isotopes c13/c12 in the sample divided by ratio of c13/c12 of the pee dee belemnite) minus 1, multiplied by 1000
equals :(ratio of 44ca to 40ca sample) divided by (ratio of 44ca std to 40ca std) minus 1,  multplied by 1000
equals: (ratio of chlorine isotopes cl37/cl35 in the sample divided by ratio of cl37/cl35 of the standard mean ocean chlorine) minus 1, multiplied by 1000
equals: (ratio of hydrogen isotopes h2/h1 in the sample divided by ratio of h2/h1 in reference material ) minus 1, multiplied by 1000
equals: (ratio of iron isotopes fe56/fe54 in the sample divided by ratio of fe56/fe54 of irmm-014) minus 1, multiplied by 1000

equals: (ratio of lithium isotopes li6/li7 in the sample divided by ratio of li6/li7 of the standard) minus 1, multiplied by 1000

equals: (ratio of magnesium isotopes mg25/mg24 in the sample divided by ratio of mg25/mg24 in the reference material) minus 1, multiplied by 1000

equals: (ratio of nitrogen isotopes n15/n14 in the sample divided by ratio of n15/n14 in the reference material) minus 1, multiplied by 1000
equals: (ratio of oxygen isotopes o18/o16 in the sample divided by ratio of o18/o16 of the standard) minus 1, multiplied by 1000
equals: (ratio of sulfur isotopes s33/s32 in the sample divided by ratio of s33/s32 in the reference material) minus 1, multiplied by 1000

equals :(ratio of 66zn to 64zn sample) divided by (ratio of 66zn std to 64zn std) minus 1, multplied by 1000
